source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers Accidental Death, Permanent Disablement and Third Degree Burns.

base_limits.type: Treatment by Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician or Chiropractor ($50 per visit)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers outpatient and hospitalisation medical expenses incurred overseas arising from accident or sickness, emergency dental expenses arising from accident, and accidental miscarriage. Includes specified limits for Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician, Chiropractor, and Dentist treatments.
Overseas medical expenses coverage includes Chinese Physicians and Chiropractors.

coverages.coverage_name: Medical Expenses Incurred Upon Return to Singapore

base_limits.type: Treatment by Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician or Chiropractor ($50 per visit)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers follow-up treatment in Singapore within 31 days of return. If no initial treatment overseas, treatment in Singapore must be sought within 48 hours of return (up to 31 days). Includes specified limits for Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician, Chiropractor, and Dentist treatments.

coverages.coverage_name: Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation (Including Mortal Remains) Back to Singapore

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person up to 70 years

limits.type: Per Insured Person up to 70 years

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers necessary evacuation or repatriation back to Singapore, including mortal remains. Includes coverage for pregnancy-related complications and pre-existing medical conditions subject to specific limits.
Payable for each complete day hospitalised overseas, up to the specified number of days.

coverages.coverage_name: Double Hospitalisation Allowance Whilst Overseas in ICU Arising from an Accident

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable for each complete day in ICU overseas due to an accident, up to the specified number of days. This benefit is paid instead of the standard Overseas Hospitalisation Allowance (Section 5).

coverages.coverage_name: Hospital Allowance for Hospitalisation in Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable for each complete day hospitalised in Singapore upon return, subject to daily limits for initial and subsequent days.
Covers extra accommodation and travelling expenses incurred on written medical advice by a qualified medical practitioner as a result of your accident or sickness.

coverages.coverage_name: Guardian for Return of Dependent Children

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays for reasonable travel and accommodation expenses for a relative or friend to accompany your unattended child(ren) home in the event of your hospitalisation overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Compassionate Visit by a Relative or Friend

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person - Due to your injury, sickness or disease
Per Family - Due to your injury, sickness or disease
Per Insured Person - In the event of your death
Per Family - In the event of your death

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers reasonable travel and accommodation costs for one relative or friend to visit you if you are hospitalised due to injury, sickness or disease, or in the event of your death overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or Damage to Baggage & Personal Effects

base_limits.type: Any one article or pair or set of articles (Section B)
Any one article for video equipment, camera, batteries and lenses (exclude softwares) (Section B)
Either one laptop computer including accessories or one tablet device (Section B)
Aggregate for electronic items or equipment

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to baggage and personal effects during the trip. Subject to per item/pair/set limits, specific limits for valuables (electronics, cameras, laptops, mobile phones, jewellery), and per suitcase/bag aggregate limit. Section B limits apply for Deluxe tier.

base_limits.type: Loss of money resulting from theft (Section E)
Fraudulent use of credit card overseas

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of essential travel documents (passport, visa, tickets) and loss of cash or traveller's cheques due to theft. Includes cover for fraudulent credit card use overseas up to a specified limit. Section E limits apply for Deluxe tier.
Covers non-refundable travel and accommodation costs if the trip is cancelled or postponed due to Insured Events occurring within 30 days before departure.
Includes coverage for loss of frequent flyer or similar travel points used to purchase an airline ticket.

Covers the loss of unused, non-refundable portions of prepaid travel costs and additional expenses incurred if you must cut short your trip and return to Singapore due to Insured Events occurring after departure.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person - Loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses whilst overseas
Per Family - Loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses whilst overseas
Per Insured Person - Cash benefit for un-utilised paid ticket cancellation

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of unused portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses whilst overseas due to Insured Events. Also pays a cash benefit for unused paid event tickets cancelled as a result of Insured Events arising.

coverages.coverage_name: Financial Collapse of Licensed Tour Operators

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of non-refundable or unused prepaid travel costs and expenses for trip cancellation or curtailment occurring after the date of policy issue due to the financial collapse of the licensed tour operator.
Covers your legal liability to pay compensation for accidental bodily injury to a third party or accidental loss of or damage to a third party's property arising during your trip.

base_limits.basis: for 1st full 6 hours (overseas or in S'pore)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Cash benefit payable for delay in arrival of checked-in baggage for every full 6 consecutive hours. Extended to cover delay if baggage wrongly picked up by another passenger overseas. Payout based on specified amounts for initial and subsequent delay periods, up to the maximum limit.

base_limits.basis: for 1st full 6 hours (overseas or in S'pore)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Cash benefit payable for delay of scheduled public transport for every full 6 consecutive hours, due to any cause outside your control ('All Risks'). Payout based on actual arrival time vs original scheduled arrival time, up to the maximum limit.
Cash benefit if you are denied boarding on a confirmed scheduled flight whilst overseas due to overbooking by the airline.

Cash benefit payable for every full 6 consecutive hours of delay if your flight is diverted from its scheduled route due to (a) adverse weather conditions or (b) landing at an alternative destination for emergency medical treatment of a fellow passenger.
Cash benefit payable for every full 12 consecutive hours of delay resulting from the hijacking of the public conveyance you are travelling on.
Cash benefit payable for every full 24 consecutive hours that pre-booked and paid hotel facilities are withdrawn due to strike, industrial action, mechanical breakdown, or structural defects.

Cash benefit if you miss a confirmed onward connecting flight at a transfer point due to the late arrival of your incoming confirmed connecting flight, and no alternative onward transportation is available within 6 hours of your scheduled arrival.
Cash benefit payable for every full 48 consecutive hours you are held captive due to kidnapping during your trip.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (In aggregate for applicable Sections)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides cover up to the aggregate limit for losses otherwise covered under specified policy sections that arise directly from an act of terrorism.
Extends the Personal Accident cover (Section 1 - Accidental Death & Permanent Disablement) to cover incidents occurring as an innocent bystander during war or civil war.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (In aggregate for applicable Sections)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides cover up to the aggregate limit for losses otherwise covered under specified policy sections that arise while participating in leisure underwater activities (e.g., scuba diving, snorkelling). Requires appropriate certification if applicable.
Covers reasonable additional accommodation expenses if your pre-booked accommodation is cancelled after the trip has commenced due to specified insured events.
Covers reasonable additional travel expenses to reach your destination or return home if your scheduled travel is disrupted due to specified insured events.
Reimburses emergency telephone call charges incurred to contact assistance services or family due to an event covered under the policy.
Covers the insurance excess or deductible amount you become legally liable to pay under the rental vehicle agreement following loss or damage to the rental vehicle.
Covers medically necessary reconstructive surgery, including skin transplantation, required as a result of accidental burns sustained during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Recuperation Allowance Due to Accidental Miscarriage

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a lump sum cash benefit following an accidental miscarriage for which medical expenses are covered under Section 2 (Medical Expenses Incurred Overseas).

coverages.coverage_name: Quarantine Allowance Due to 17 Infectious Diseases Upon Return to Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Cash benefit payable for each full day of compulsory quarantine you undergo upon return to Singapore as required by authorities, due to having contracted one of the 17 specified infectious diseases during your trip.

base_limits.type: Loss or damage of golf equipment

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to your golf equipment during the trip. Hole-in-one celebration costs, unused green fees, and damage to golf buggies are not covered under the Deluxe plan.

The policy includes coverage for participation in amateur sports including tandem air sports (such as skydiving, hang-gliding, paragliding), snow-skiing, hot-air ballooning, bungee jumping, indoor rock climbing, and trekking up to 3,500m above sea level for all mountains. This applies to relevant sections like Personal Accident and Medical Expenses.

coverages.coverage_name: Free and Automatic Extension of Policy

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Policy coverage is automatically extended for up to 14 days if your return to Singapore is delayed beyond the policy end date due to injury, illness, quarantine, or delayed/cancelled public conveyance beyond your control.
